content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=34-41, y=-87)
Consists of following entities:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (41.0,-86.0), (39.0,-85.0), (37.0,-85.0) mining coal
- Collection chests at positions (40.5,-87.5), (39.5,-83.5), (36.5,-86.5) storing coal
- Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5) moving coal between chests

### Iron/Copper Ore Mining at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) mining iron and copper ore
- Collection chest at (-27.5,-59.5) storing ore
- Burner inserter at (-26.5,-59.5) moving ore
- Transport belt system starting at (-29.5,-60.5)

### Iron Mining Complex at position(x=-10 to -6, y=-59)
Consists of:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0) mining iron ore
- Collection chests at positions (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5) storing iron ore
- Multiple burner inserters and transport belts moving ore

### Smelting Line at position(x=-27 to -21, y=-58)
Consists of:
- 3 Stone furnaces at positions (-27.0,-58.0), (-23.0,-58.0), (-21.0,-58.0)
- Input chest at (-27.5,-59.5) and output chest at (-24.5,-58.5)
- Multiple burner inserters moving materials

### Main Smelting Array at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Consists of:
- 4 Stone furnaces at positions (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters moving materials between chests and furnaces

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=17-27)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5) providing water
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0) heating water
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5) generating power
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electric poles distributing power

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting from chests
- Ensure the source chest contains the items you want to extract
- Check if the chest inventory is accessible from your current position

### Errors when inserting fuel
- Verify you have the required fuel type (coal) in your inventory before attempting to insert
- Make sure the target entity accepts the type of fuel you're trying to insert

### Entity placement and connection issues
- When placing fluid-carrying entities (pipes, boilers, steam engines), ensure they are properly connected in sequence
- Check that power poles are within connection range of each other and the devices they need to power

### Resource management
- Monitor chest capacities to prevent overflow
- Ensure mining drills have sufficient fuel to operate continuously
